title: 'Nepali Times' Editor: After Quakes, Nepalese Surprisingly Upbeat
teaser: Two earthquakes and numerous aftershocks have hit Nepal, killing thousands and leaving millions in need. Kunda Dixit, editor of the Nepali Times, tells NPR's Scott Simon about how people are coping.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
